definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: After tough training, I got rid of my self-abasement and became confident.
sentences.chinese: 经过艰苦的训练，使我增强了自信心，消除了自卑感。

sentences.english: There is no significant difference between genders in self-confidence development of college normal students.
sentences.chinese: 师专生在自信心总体水平上的性别差异并不显著。

sentences.english: Has certain self-confidence, but the training enthusiasm is not high.
sentences.chinese: 具有一定的自信心，但是训练热情步高。

sentences.english: Watching yourself give a presentation can give you a tremendous confidence boost.
sentences.chinese: 观看自己的演讲可以使你的自信心瞬间爆棚。

sentences.english: Low self-esteem. When you have low or negative self-esteem, you put little value on your opinions and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 低度自信自信心过低时，对自我价值认识不足。

sentences.english: His words inspired confidence in me.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激发了我的自信心。

sentences.english: Do not betray my confidence. I await your response.
sentences.chinese: 请没有要孤负我的自信心，等待您的回答。

sentences.english: If one once loses self-confidence, he can never expect to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 一个人一旦失去了自信心，就甭想获得成功。

sentences.english: About this evening raid shenyang semi-detached house action he appears self-confidence is dye-in-the-wood.
sentences.chinese: 关于今晚突袭沈家洋房行动，他显得自信心十足。

sentences.english: Learning how to create happiness on your own is a key part of building self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 学习怎样给自己带来快乐是建立自信心的必由之路。

sentences.english: The spirit of learning is a good learning attitude and full of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 学习精神就是指良好的学习态度和饱满的自信心。

sentences.english: Your low self-confidence will limit and paralyze you.
sentences.chinese: 你消沉的自信心将击垮你，限制你。

sentences.english: Bonds with other people improve our outlook and build sef-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 与别人保持联系能改善我们的外在形象并建立自信心。

sentences.english: The global financial meltdown has further buttressed China's confidence.
sentences.chinese: 全球金融危机进一步巩固了中国的自信心。

sentences.english: I bragged to my sister, mother, and boyfriend about this.
sentences.chinese: 我自信心爆棚，跟姐姐妈妈和男朋友都炫耀了一番。
